slides.title: When faced with a communication challenge (work or personal), how do you typically resolve it?
You notice someone close to you (friend, family, coworker) seems upset after an interaction. How do you approach it?
How do you handle communication differences in a group with diverse preferences (work team, project group, family)?
You receive feedback that your communication (emails, texts, conversations) is often misunderstood. What do you do?
Which area of communication needs the most improvement in your life?
